Myrmidon watched the display of Megatron with a cold expression,
crimson optics unflinching. 

However inside things were much different. A cecophony of thoughts and
memories flooded his consciousness as he watched, the name Megatron
floating amongst the wave. A constant litanty, part statement part
question, "Megatron, who is the true Megaton." 

It was as if somthing in his programing was attempting to emerge.  It
reminded him of how he felt when he first emerged here, and that drive
to find Megatron, but more pronounced. When he heard from Hydras in the
begining he thought his duty was answered, and yet now perhaps there
was doubt. 

It was as if there was something he was suppose to do or remember, but
he could not . . . yet!

With a shake of his head he cleared his thoughts as the image of
Megatron faded. In frustration and a desire to cover his distraction he
grunted and spoke over his radio, "Hydras, you had better if get out
here if you wish to resolve this as you had hoped!"

Preston
(Myrmidon)

--- Robert Riley <chiyohakuryuu@...> wrote:

> Malice:
> 
> Dodging Trelos while hovering in vehicle mode was in no way easy.  He
> recieved signifigant scratches to his ventral heatshielding, but in a
> few minutes it would be repaired.  In the meantime he transformed and
> focused his attention to Myrmidon.  A small panel on his chest opened
> and a communication holo emitter.  He made contact with Megatron via
> internal radio, and the image of the large and powerful Megatron X
> stood before Myrmidon.  Body very different, but his head and faced
> almost unchanged, save for a youthful countance.
> 
> "*Hmm?  WHo are these creatures?  They look like slag in a slag heap.
>  Ah, I see now, they cower under that Hydras, huh?  Hmpt!  Pitiful
> excuses for Decepticons.  They can't conquer Prehistory Earth, what
> would make them suitable to follow me?*"
> 
> "I don't know, they talk an awful lot.  Maybe you should give thema
> chance?"
> 
> "*YOU give them a second chance.  I'm dealing with more important
> matters!*"
